abstract: In a deal expected to be announced Monday, Vuguru will become its own company, with Canada’s Rogers Communications as a minority stakeholder.
snippet: In a deal expected to be announced Monday, Vuguru will become its own company, with Canada’s Rogers Communications as a minority stakeholder.
lead_paragraph: Bolstered by an investment from Rogers Communications, one of Canada’s largest media companies, the budding new-media mogul Michael Eisner is expanding his Web video studio.

headline.main: Eisner’s Web Video Studio to Emerge With Backing
headline.print_headline: Eisner’s Web Video Studio To Emerge With Backing

abstract: Barclays Capital has named Joe Gatto as its chairman of investment banking for the Americas, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
snippet: Barclays Capital has named Joe Gatto as its chairman of investment banking for the Americas, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.
lead_paragraph: Barclays Capital  has named Joseph D. Gatto as its chairman of investment banking for the Americas, according to an internal memorandum obtained by DealBook.

headline.main: Barclays Capital Names Gatto to I-Banking Post

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
